attributes.action: give free rail travel to all under 16s
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think that under 16s shoudn't have to pay to use trains. For example, if they need to catch the train to go to school, it means they have to spend hundreds of pounds a year just getting to and from school! If it can happen with buses, then why not with trains?
